item.title: Scripting News: Saturday, August 25, 2018
item.description: I like inclusive movements. I don’t care how you got to the party. Whether you took the subway, walked, came by spaceship or were driven by your chauffeur. What’s important is you’re here. That's also the philosophy of America, btw.

source:outline.text: Scripting News: Saturday, August 25, 2018

item.description: “Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies - God damn it, you've got to be kind.”

source:outline.text: “Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies - God damn it, you've got to be kind.”

item.description: “Everybody’s crying peace on earth, just as soon as we win this war.”

source:outline.text: “Everybody’s crying peace on earth, just as soon as we win this war.”
